reviews.review: so so where do i start this game has been very good for 400 hours until i hit 450 this game has become very toxic with many russian and very annoying af players and mostly cheaters so its not really fun anymore wouldnt recommend this game for +450 hours yay :)))))))))))) if im honest for the amount of cheaters and toxic players ive seen id rather stick my d in a blender than play this game anymore :)

Very fun game, No pay to win which is good. And requires skill, Must say buy prime you will incounter Cheaters if you go *Free to play* but recommend Prime. Teamplay is required. You can play *Team deathmatch* which is free for all and you can play casual which is 2 teams vs eachother but with more players than competitive. Competitive is a Harder mode where you play 5 v 5 and you more you win in comp you more you rank up and level up. In other ways im trying to say is its fun and you can get nice Knives :D
